songs.title: 2018 Billboard Music Award Medley
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Can I get a hallelujah?
Can I get an amen?
Feels like the Holy Ghost running through ya
When I play the highway FM
I find my soul revival
Singing every single verse
Yeah I guess that’s my church
Aye, I love Maren

[Verse 2]
I'm way too good at goodbyes
(I'm way too good at goodbyes)
I'm way too good at goodbyes
(I'm way too good at goodbyes)
No way that you'll see me cry
(No way that you'll see me cry)
I'm way too good at goodbyes
(I'm way too good at goodbyes)

[Verse 3]
Nobody pray for me
It's been that day for me
Waaaaay (yeah, yeah!)
Be humble, sit down
Be humble, sit down
Be humble, sit down
I said be humble, sit down
Be humble, sit down
Be humble, sit down

[Verse 4]
Thunder, feel the thunder
Lightning then the thunder, oh yes baby
Thunder, feel the thunder
Lightning then the thunder, c'mon now

[Verse 5]
Young dumb
Young, young dumb and broke
Young dumb
Young, young dumb and broke
Young dumb
Young, young dumb and broke
Young dumb broke high school kids

[Verse 6]
Drop top Porsche, Rollie on my wrist
Diamonds up and down my chain
Can't you see, straight stuntin', can't tell me nothin'
Bossed up and I changed the game
It's like ayy
Flexin' on the 'Gram like ayy
Hit the Lil' Jon, okay (okay), okay (okay)
Got me drippin' in finesse and getting paid, ow

[Verse 7]
I'm in love with the shape of you
Push and pull like a magnet do
Although my heart is falling too
I'm in love with your body
Hey, I'm in love with your body
I'm in love with the shape of you

[Verse 8]
Oh, I've been shaking
I love it when you go crazy
You take all my inhibitions
Baby, there's nothing holding me back
You take me places that tear up my reputation
Manipulate my decisions
Baby, there's nothing holding me...

[Verse 9]
Ooh, look what you made me do
Look what you made me do
Look what you just made me do
Look what you just made me—
Ooh, look what you made me do
Look what you made me do
Look what you just made me do
Look what you just made me do

[Outro]
Lightning, lightning, thunder then the lightning
Oh, I'm in love, I'm in love
I'm way too good at goodbyes
I'm way too good at goodbyes
Can I get an amen? Can I get an amen?
Hallelujah
Be humble
Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah
Yeah, I guess that's my church
